metadata.title: CVE-2024-21116 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox product of Oracle Virtualization(component: Core). Supported versions that are affected are Prior to7.0.16. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attackerwith logon to the infrastructure where Oracle VM VirtualBox executes tocompromise Oracle VM VirtualBox. Successful attacks of this vulnerabilitycan result in takeover of Oracle VM VirtualBox. Note: This vulnerabilityapplies to Linux hosts only. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.8 (Confidentiality,Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: virtualbox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
